Description:
***UNDER CONTRACT***
Light-filled, split-level retreat in prime location.
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac, it's hard to believe this secluded sanctuary is only a 15-minute walk to The Ringwood Shopping district, Eastland & Town Square Restaurant hub. Positioned with the Mullum Mullum Creek Trail at the end of the street, this homes obvious character and charm are coupled with lifestyle and location.
Freshly painted and spotless throughout, this architecturally designed period home on a generous 439m2 (approx.) allotment, is flooded with natural light. The native garden setting, just beyond the sun-drenched deck, blends through the French doors into the home seamlessly, creating an ambiance that's almost tangible.
The upper level boasts a king size master suite with walk-in-robe and ensuite. Bedrooms 2 & 3, both double bedrooms, have built-in-robes. This level also offers a study nook, main bathroom with shower and bathtub, separate toilet and double linen/storage cupboard.
A few steps down onto the polished Tasmania oak floorboards and you are in the main living zone with gourmet kitchen hosting stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel oven, appliance cupboard, gorgeous marble splash back and breakfast bar. A large family/meals room and separate lounge, both overlook the sun-drenched deck, a great outdoor entertaining area thanks to the retractable, café style folding arm awnings. A 4th bedroom or home office with built-in-robe & storage is conveniently located next to the front door. The homes high ceilings and flowing spaces make it open living at its finest.
The lower level consists of a laundry, separate toilet, massive double garage with built in storage and ample space for workshop or home gym.
To top off the long list of indoor features, the home also includes newly built cellar. A hideaway space for a quiet glass of wine and a sneaky cheese platter ... in the luxury of your own home. To indulge yourself even further, the option for the cellar to be fully stocked can be negotiated.
Extras features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a 5,000 litre water tank, small garden shed plus bike shed. Private and easy to maintain garden, fruit trees and veggie beds will make you want to spend more time at home. A kid's zone with large sandpit, cubby and trampoline is picture perfect for a young family or young grandparents.
Prime location! Close to Eastland, Ringwood station, childcare centres, schools, hospitals and easy access to Eastlink.
